ModMetaData.name: Food Nullifier - Never Eat Food Again!
ModMetaData.author: GeodesicDragon
ModMetaData.description: Adds a food nullifier which is quite expensive and requires great skill to make, but will completely eliminate the need for a pawn - or animal - to eat. Should work with animals added by other mods as long as they use 'AnimalThingBase.' Installing a nullifier will reduce a pawn's consciousness by 10%, though this can be disabled by going to Options > More Mod Settings > Food Nullifier. "THIS IS JUST A NUCLEAR STOMACH DONE DIFFERENTLY!" Pawns with a nuclear stomach will still get hungry, just at a slower rate; the food nullifier eliminates hunger completely, and - as an added bonus - does not carry a risk of cancer, which makes it superior to the nuclear stomach by a substantial amount.
